Translations.Text: Abantu bakubuuza ku lunaku lw'enkomerero bagambe nti: mazima okumanyibwa kwalwo kuli eri Katonda, ye omanya otya oba olunaku lw'enkomerero luli kumpi
Mazima Katonda yakolimira abakaafiiri era naabategekera omuliro Sai-ir
Baakutuula mu gwo bugenderevu, tebagenda kufuna wa mukwano oba omutaasa
Ku lunaku ebyenyi byabwe lwe birikyusibwakyusibwa mu muliro nga bagamba nti zitusanze singa twagondera Katonda era netugondera omubaka
Era ne bagamba nti: ayi Mukama omulabirizi waffe mazima ffe twagondera abakulembeze baffe n'abatutumufu mu ffe, olwo nno nebatubuza ekkubo
Ayi Mukama omulabirizi waffe bawe ebibonerezo byabwe nga bibaziddwamu emirundi ebiri era obakolimire olukolimira olunene

Abange mmwe abakkiriza temubeeranga abo abaanyiiiza Musa (bwe baagamba nti aliko obulemu ku mubirigwe obumugaana okunaaba naffe) wabula Katonda yamutukuza ku ekyo kye baagamba era bulijjo wa kitiibwa ewa Katonda
Abange mmwe abakkiriza mutye Katonda era mwogere ebigambo ebituufu
Ajja kubalongooseza emirimu gya mmwe era abasonyiwe ebyonoono bya mmwe, era bulijjo omuntu agondera Katonda n’omubakawe aba yeesiimye olwesiima olusuffu

Mazima ffe twayagala obuvunaanyizibwa okubuwa eggulu omusanvu n'ensi n'ensozi naye nebigaana okubwetikka nebibwesamba, ye omuntu naabwetikka (naatatuukiriza era olw'ekyo) n'abeera eyeeyisa obubi atamanyi

Olwo nno Katonda alyoke abe nga abonereza abannanfusi abasajja n'abannanfusi abakazi, n’abasajja abagatta ku Katonda ebintu ebirala n’abakazi abagatta ku Katonda ebintu ebirala, era abe nga asonyiwa abakkiriza abasajja n’abakkiriza abakazi. Era bulijjo Katonda muyitirivu wa kusonyiwa muyitirivu wa kusaasira
